text: A Soldier Came Back from the Front () is a 1971 Soviet drama movie directed by Nikolay Gubenko.Биография певицы Александры СтрельченкоПРИШЕЛ СОЛДАТ С ФРОНТА It stars Mikhail Gluzskiy, Irina Miroshnichenko, and Nikolay Gubenko. == Actors == * Mikhail Gluzskiy as Ivan Menshikov * Irina Miroshnichenko as Vera Kurkina * Nikolay Gubenko as Nikolay Maksimovich Yegorov * Lena Smirnova as Nadenka Yegorova * Misha Rodyakov as Leshenka == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1971 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Nikolay Gubenko
title: A Soldier Came Back from the Front
